title: Effortless Mantra Vedic Meditation & Ayurveda - Van Nuys, CA
description: Specialties: Specializing in mind/body/spirit integration. We excel at stress management using a combination of Meditation training, Vedic Siddhis practice, Yoga asanas, Chakra balancing, Vedanta (ancient knowledge of the Veda) and Ayurveda (ancient system of natural medicine). Modern technologies include Infrared light therapy and Neurofeedback also available. Meditation & Yoga Retreats are offered in Crestline, CA on Lake Gregory, as well as longer explorations in India. Clases, lectures, and workshops form regularly. Join our newsletter mailing list to stay informed about upcoming events. And join us Zoom for group meditation. Established in 2011. Catherine Inglese founded the Effortless Mantra VM & Ayurveda Center in May 2011 upon returning to Los Angeles from India after years of training with Sri Maharishi Vyasananda Saraswati. Knowledge and Techniques for improving health and happiness that were considered ancient 5,000 years ago are now being shared with the modern world in an easy to understand way. Classes are always forming. Sign up today!
